name: H0ST
description: Cyberpunk arcade-action, inspired by games like Alien Shooter\UBERMOSH and movies like TRON\Johnny Mnemonic
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit SP1 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.20GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: SyncMaster-4 (NVIDIA High Definition Audio) Additional Notes: Widescreen monitor recommended
